name: Marina Silva Costa
summary_blurb: Marina Silva Costa is an experienced Equity Research Analyst with a strong background in fundamental research and financial modeling. She has worked with notable firms such as Vanguard Group and Bain & Company, focusing on sectors including healthcare and consumer. Marina holds an MBA from MIT Sloan School of Management and has developed investment recommendations for publicly traded companies.
education_highlight: MBA in Business Administration from MIT Sloan School of Management
